title: Coinbase Stock Hits 18-Month High Alongside Bitcoin and Ethereum
description: Coinbase stock—which trades as COIN on the Nasdaq—hit an 18-month high on Friday. Bitcoin and Ethereum are also surging in price.

title: Binance’s CZ seeks to avoid jail time, refutes DOJ’s flight risk claim
description:
Changpeng ‘CZ’ Zhao, the founder and former CEO of Binance, is contesting the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) motion to restrict his travel before sentencing, asserting he doesn’t pose a flight risk. On Nov. 23, CryptoSlate reported that the DOJ moved to prevent CZ from leaving the U.S., arguing that the Binance founder posed a […]

The post Binance’s CZ seeks to avoid jail time, refutes DOJ’s flight risk claim appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Wallet of Satoshi Exits US Market Amidst Record-Breaking Month, Leaving Customers to Seek Alternatives
description: On Friday, Wallet of Satoshi, a provider of Lightning Network payment services, announced its departure from the U.S. market, though it refrained from providing specific reasons. The firm informed its U.S. clientele that they could “withdraw and transfer” their funds to a different wallet. Wallet of Satoshi Halts U.S. Operations A recent update on X […]

title: Justin Sun announces airdrop for HTX and Poloniex users following hack
description: HTX and Poloniex are about to resume deposits and withdrawals, and Justin Sun announced an airdrop for affected users.

title: Crypto Clash: Bitcoin and Ethereum Brace for Epic $6.5 Billion Showdown
description: Bitcoin market cap is expected to drop following the recent Binance and DOJ $4 billion settlement and change of CEO. However, the Bitcoin price has been predicted to set a new all-time high after the halving event.  The Bitcoin (BTC) market has slowed down following an unexpected rally that took most of the assets to [...]

title: Binance Listing Sparks Excitement in Blur’s NFT Community
description:
The price of Blur (BLUR) jumped by 28% in the last 24 hours after Binance confirmed that it would list the cryptocurrency. According to the exchange announcement, spot trading for the BLUR/USDT and BLUR/BTC pairs would be open for trading by 9:00 UTC on November 24. However, Binance also mentioned that withdrawals would only begin […]

The post Binance Listing Sparks Excitement in Blur’s NFT Community appeared first on Coin Edition.
